item.title: Citrix ADC (NetScaler ADC) and Gateway (NetScaler Gateway)
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link Citrix Statement https://support.citrix.com/article/CTX335705 Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-4104: Not vuln ; CVE-2021-44228: Not vuln ; CVE-2021-45046: Not vuln ; CVE-2021-45105: Not vuln NCSC-NL Citrix continues to investigate any potential impact on Citrix-managed cloud services. If, as the investigation continues, any Citrix-managed services are found to be affected by this issue, Citrix will take immediate action to remediate the problem.

item.title: Citrix ADC (NetScaler ADC) and Gateway (NetScaler Gateway)
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Citrix Statement https://support.citrix.com/article/CTX335705 Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Citrix continues to investigate any potential impact on Citrix-managed cloud services. If, as the investigation continues, any Citrix-managed services are found to be affected by this issue, Citrix will take immediate action to remediate the problem. Customers using Citrix-managed cloud services do not need to take any action.
